mapper.select: select so.id as orderId, so.order_no as orderNo, so.status, so.pay_status as payStatus, so.order_type as orderType, spt.en_name as productName, so.freight, sc.colour_name as productColour, sc.colour_code as productColourCode, so.delivery_type as deliveryType, spte.payment_name as paymentName, so.scooter_quantity as scooterQuantity, so.battery_qty as batteryQty, so.etd_delivery_time as etdDeliveryTime, so.product_price as productPrice, so.total_price as totalPrice, so.amount_paid as amountPaid, sob.id as orderBId, sps.en_name as enName, sob.parts_qty as partsQty, sob.parts_price as partsPrice, sob.created_time as createdTime, so.amount_obligation as amountObligation, so.amount_discount as amountDiscount, so.prepaid_deposit as prepaidDeposit, spt.picture from site_order so left join site_order_b sob on so.id = sob.order_id and sob.dr = 0 left join site_parts sps on sob.parts_id = sps.id and sps.dr = 0 left join site_product spt on so.product_id = spt.id and spt.dr = 0 left join site_colour sc on so.colour_id = sc.id and sc.dr = 0 left join site_payment_type spte on so.payment_type_id = spte.id and spte.dr = 0 where so.dr = 0 and so.id = #{id}

select so.id as orderId, so.order_no as orderNo, so.status, so.pay_status as payStatus, so.order_type as orderType, spt.en_name as productName, so.freight, sc.colour_name as productColour, sc.colour_code as productColourCode, so.delivery_type as deliveryType, spte.payment_name as paymentName, so.scooter_quantity as scooterQuantity, so.battery_qty as batteryQty, so.etd_delivery_time as etdDeliveryTime, so.product_price as productPrice, so.total_price as totalPrice, so.amount_paid as amountPaid, sob.id as orderBId, sps.en_name as enName, sob.parts_qty as partsQty, sob.parts_price as partsPrice, sob.created_time as createdTime, spt.picture from site_order so left join site_order_b sob on so.id = sob.order_id and sob.dr = 0 left join site_parts sps on sob.parts_id = sps.id and sps.dr = 0 left join site_product spt on so.product_id = spt.id and spt.dr = 0 left join site_colour sc on so.colour_id = sc.id and sc.dr = 0 left join site_payment_type spte on so.payment_type_id = spte.id and spte.dr = 0 where so.dr = 0 and so.customer_id = #{id}

select a.product_model_name from site_product_model a left join site_product b on b.product_model_id = a.id left join site_order c on c.product_id = b.id where a.dr = 0 and b.dr = 0 and c.dr = 0 and c.id = #{orderId}
